mapper.select: SELECT HCD_CD -- 홈카드코드값 조회쿼리 FROM T_CMY_USR_M WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND USR_ID = #{session.userId}

-- 엔지니어 개인 단위 조회 (엔지니어 권한인 경우) 홈카드 코드값 : HW300 SELECT NVL(TOTAL_CNT,0) AS TOTAL_CNT -- 1. 전체건수 , NVL((TOTAL_CNT - COMPLETE_CNT),0) AS INCOMPLETE_CNT -- 2. 방문건수 , NVL(COMPLETE_CNT,0) AS COMPLETE_CNT -- 3. 완료건수 , (TO_CHAR(NVL(round(COMPLETE_CNT/TOTAL_CNT, 3),0) * 100,'FM9990.0') || '%') AS COMPLETE_RATE -- 4. 처리율 FROM (SELECT COUNT(t1.CST_SV_ASN_NO) AS TOTAL_CNT , SUM(DECODE(t1.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD,'20',1,0)) AS COMPLETE_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ t1 WHERE t1.ASN_OJ_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') AND t1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = #{session.ogTpCd} AND t1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} )

-- 회사 전체 조회 (매니저 권한인 경우) 홈카드 코드값 : HW100 SELECT NVL(TOTAL_CNT,0) AS TOTAL_CNT -- 1. 전체건수 , NVL((TOTAL_CNT - COMPLETE_CNT),0) AS INCOMPLETE_CNT -- 2. 방문건수 , NVL(COMPLETE_CNT,0) AS COMPLETE_CNT -- 3. 완료건수 , (TO_CHAR(NVL(round(COMPLETE_CNT/TOTAL_CNT, 3),0) * 100,'FM9990.0') || '%') AS COMPLETE_RATE -- 4. 처리율 FROM ( SELECT SUM(t1.TOTAL_CNT) AS TOTAL_CNT -- 1. 전체건수 , SUM(t1.COMPLETE_CNT) AS COMPLETE_CNT FROM MV_WSM_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ_01 t1 )
